ygData.subject: Re: Ok, now what? (spoilers)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm.  I saw him twice in a 3 hour period when I got my shackle. Perhaps you need to find something to do, like kill gnome guards, or just camp Meldrath for
ygData.messageBody:
Princess Xaera wrote:
>
> From: "Princess Xaera" <xaera@...>
>
> I'm not sure if this is broken or not (maybe just on our server), but we did
> that for 12 hours straight over 2 days and the mino hero never spawned.
>
> So I don't know what's up with that.
>
> X.

Hmm. I saw him twice in a 3 hour period when I got my shackle.
Perhaps you need to find something to do, like kill gnome guards, or
just camp Meldrath for exp, and hope he shows up. Actually waiting
for something to spawn influences how long it will take for them to
spawn I think. Quantum interactions and such ;)

Xilith
